pages.text: In this section I will try to show some tips and tricks that may prove helpful.

pages.title: Remove Enchantments
pages.text: Use a Grindstone to pull enchantments off of books, tools, weapons, and armor.

pages.title: Make a Map
pages.text: Since there are no minimap/map mods for 1.18 yet, make a Minecraft Map! After initializing the map, place it back into a crafting table surrounded by paper so you can see it zoomed out - this can be done four times. By making a map you will be able to find your way home!
